text:
In the french version of the docs for httpd-1.3 the syntax for the <FilesMatch>
directive is incorrect.

It reads "Syntaxe : <FilesMatch regex> ... </Files>"
It should be "Syntaxe : <FilesMatch regex> ... </FilesMatch>"
creator: spunkmeyer@free.fr

text: Ok fixed a few years later. Thanks.
creator: slive@apache.org
